instructions.1: Heat grill. Soak six 10 to 12-inch bamboo skewers in water 15 minutes.
instructions.2: Thread shrimp onto skewers. Season with salt and pepper. Lightly brush with barbecue sauce.
instructions.3: When ready to grill, place shrimp on grill over medium heat. Cover and cook 6 to 7 minutes or until shrimp is pink, turning once.

Is barbecue sauce from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
